abstract: The background color of the marker balloon.
overview:
## Discussion

The default value of this property is `nil`, which applies the standard color that’s appropriate for the current map style.

# markerTintColor

**Instance Property**

The background color of the marker balloon.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var markerTintColor: NSColor? { get set }
```

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var markerTintColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is `nil`, which applies the standard color that’s appropriate for the current map style.
